meanings.definition: A person or thing that finalizes or completes something.
meanings.sent1: The finalizers made sure all the details were in place before the event.
meanings.sent2: The finalizers were the last ones to review the project before it was submitted.
meanings.sent3: The finalizers double-checked everything, even the smallest details, to make sure nothing was missed.
meanings.sent4: She was like the finalizer of the puzzle, putting the last piece in its place to complete the picture.
meanings.sent5: The finalizers were like the finishing touch that made the whole project come together perfectly.

meanings.definition: The act of finalizing or completing something.
meanings.sent1: The finalizers of the deal were signing the contract to make it official.
meanings.sent2: The finalizers of the movie were adding the last special effects to complete the film.
meanings.sent3: The finalizers of the party were the ones who put up the decorations and set everything in place.
meanings.sent4: The finalizers of the race were the last runners crossing the finish line, completing the competition.
meanings.sent5: The finalizers of the recipe were the garnishes that added the perfect finishing touch to the dish.
